attributes.action: We demand that the national lottery goes back to £1 per go and back to 49 balls
attributes.additional_details:
We all know the national lottery has made millions when it was a £1 ago now its £2 pound they being greedy and we haven't seen where this extra money is going 

You should of made a new game because you've made it 59 balls 
instead of 49
attributes.background:
We all know the national lottery done well in helping local communities back when it was £1 per go. 

We demand it goes back to £1 and we demand to see more of where the money is going.
